name: None of Us
overview: This is not a game in progress! Just a mini game for testing visuals and gameplay (amongst other things)! The essence of the test is to obscure the opponents from the players viewpoint with light/shadow. Ok, we all see that in modern platforms, but not under AMIGA - AMOS Pro. Req: Amiga with ECS chip, 2mb chipram and a fast Cpu. Normal versionn is working with 1 bitmap layer, EHBversion is with 2 layers so it is slower. "M" key = map function.
